blurb: Simple, expressive, and portable, Arturo is a batteries-included language inspired by REBOL and Smalltalk.

key_features.title: Modern
key_features.content: Arturo is a modern, fast-evolving language.

key_features.title: Cross-platform
key_features.content: Arturo runs on macOS, Linux, Windows, FreeBSD and more.

key_features.title: Code is data
key_features.content: Arturo programs can operate on their own code.

key_features.title: General-purpose
key_features.content: Arturo is suitable for a wide range of applications.

key_features.title: Documentation
key_features.content: Arturo has a robust documentation suite and a helpful community.

key_features.title: Expressive
key_features.content: Arturo is designed to be expressive and readable.
